text: Saildrone is a Series A, venture-funded startup based in Alameda, and we design and manufacture autonomous wind and solar powered vehicles. We have revenue, and we are backed by Social Capital, The Capricorn Investment Group, Lux Capital and The Schmidt Family Foundation. This is an excellent opportunity to join a small team and make a difference. To see a current list of opening, please click here: https://careers.jobscore.com/careers/saildrone/
